body_text:
As a last-resort in case a preference experiment breaks something about network access, or the user is away from the network for a significant amount of time, the add-on should expire any preference experiments with a lastSeen date older than 30 days.
@gregglind I think we might actually want to bump this down to something like a week instead of 30 days, as we've almost certainly lost the user by that point if their network access is still broken. Is that okay?

title: Expire active preference experiments after 30 days if we can't connect to the service
body:
As a last-resort in case a preference experiment breaks something about network access, or the user is away from the network for a significant amount of time, the add-on should expire any preference experiments with a `lastSeen` date older than 30 days. 

@gregglind I think we might actually want to bump this down to something like a week instead of 30 days, as we've almost certainly lost the user by that point if their network access is still broken. Is that okay?
